title: Rotator cuff tear
summary: A rotator cuff tear is an injury where one or more of the tendons or muscles of the rotator cuff of the shoulder get torn.[4] Symptoms may include shoulder pain, which is often worse with movement, or weakness.[1] This may limit peopleâ€™s ability to brush their hair or put on clothing.[4] Clicking may also occur with movement of the arm.[4]
